name: Firehome
description:
Keep your fire alive :-)

(Over the next few days I'll be adding some settings and solving bugs!)

Move - WASD
Interact - Left click / Spacebar
Drop back item - Right click
Exit - ESC
Restart - R

(The goal is to keep all fireplaces alive!)

Hope you enjoy it! Thank you for playing :-)

I did not create any of the art included in the game.
